roleset.name: attempt
roleset.note: EFFORT-N NOTES: Based on verb entry try.01; semantically corresponds to VN class try-61. (from effort.01-n)

example.name: make_effort-l: Within LVC, all arguments
example.text: If you make an effort to do what you can , you will immediately find that your burdens have been lightened .

example.name: effort-n: nominal Arg1
example.text: Simon became inarticulate in his effort to express mankind's essential illness
